channel.title: afternoon-project on untitled
channel.description: Recent content in afternoon-project on untitled

item.title: Moving our money tracking back-end to the cloud
item.description: This project is the result of my experimentation with mobile development. Do keep this in mind if you decide to follow my instructions to implement your mobile app. The concepts are there, but some Flutter related specifics may not be that by the book. The source code is available on GitHub/tjerman/money. Moving to Planet Crust Disclosure I am a core Corteza contributor, and I work with Planet Crust. To move to Planet Crust we firstly need to create an account.

item.title: Building a simple money tracking mobile application with Corteza
item.description: This project is the result of my experimentation with mobile development. Do keep this in mind if you decide to follow my instructions to implement your mobile app. The concepts are there, but some Flutter related specifics may not be that by the book. The source code is available on GitHub/tjerman/money. What we will be building We’ll build simple money tracking application that holds a list of transactions (inbound and outbound).
